cu.explanation_en: GNB_PORT_FOR_X2U changed from 36422 to 0, which is out of valid port range (1-65535). This simulates an invalid port configuration that would cause connection failures in X2-U interface.
cu.explanation_zh: GNB_PORT_FOR_X2U 从 36422 更改为 0，超出有效端口范围 (1-65535)。这模拟了 X2-U 接口中会导致连接失败的无效端口配置。

du.explanation_en: ra_ContentionResolutionTimer changed from 7 to 0, which is below the valid range and will cause RACH contention resolution failures, preventing UE access.
du.explanation_zh: ra_ContentionResolutionTimer 从 7 更改为 0，低于有效范围，将导致 RACH 争用解决失败，阻止 UE 接入。
